about_info1: My name is Anna, I am 24 years old, I am Junior Front-End Developer. I have been learning front-end for about 1 year. I' am looking to take on work and to increase my skills as a Web Developer.
about_info2: I like learning new technologies and use them to create cool things. My personal qualities are ability to achieve goals, effective time planning, perseverance, ability to easily maintain business and professional relationships, desire for professional development.
about_info3: When I work at every task, I learn something new, I am not afraid to ask for help and advice. It is important for me to complete the task quickly and effectively. It is important for me not only to gain experience, but also to take my place in a team where I can be useful, with which I can move into the future, contributing to the common deal.
